i cant hear them but that isnt a big concern because intricate technical phenomena still prove that something is hppening
   
  i dont know why shower radios work so well but its likely the extra insulation , moisture proofing of volume and tuning controls
   
  rf will go accross a slightly damp spot like its a perfect short circuit

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
  Thanks, but there's still the same problem that not all can hear. From a 
co-worker;

"You have a good imagination, Frank!!! All it sounds like to me, is trying 
to tune in a radio!

Very interesting, though!!!"


Frank
